body:
I created this guild because I wanted a place to post my red panda pics. I don't have significant amounts of time to be watching for spam and responding to reports. Ideally, there will be a second guildmaster who is active between 12am and 12pm utc, although filling this entire time slot is not absolutely necessary (obviously).

The rules here are very simple - if it's related to red pandas, it stays. The duties of a guildmaster are kicking posts that are not related to red pandas, and ensuring the comments are following the ruqqus rules.

If you want to be a guildmaster here, simply leave a comment declaring your intent. There will be no fancy interview process, but accounts should be at least 2 weeks old and have at least 20 rep.

If you want to be a guildmaster here, simply leave a comment declaring your intent. There will be no fancy interview process, but accounts should be at least 2 weeks old and have at least 20 rep.
title: If you want to be a guildmaster, leave a comment here.

body:
It's not a hard requirement. You have plenty of rep.

I'm going to wait until tomorrow to see if there are going to be more volunteers.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: I'm not wanting to be a guildmaster here as I have plenty of my own already, but I wanted to congratulate you for how you're managing adding guildmasters/mods. This is exactly how it should be done.
body_html: I'm not wanting to be a guildmaster here as I have plenty of my own already, but I wanted to congratulate you for how you're managing adding guildmasters/mods. This is exactly how it should be done.
